author: taylor
msg: - Load a wml or html profile depending on:
- already set customization mediatype in the user session
- if used mediatype is different than the customization mediatype
- Create a list of all used portlets inside a pane
- Store the name of the currently edited pane in the session object
- Store only new Portlets on the stack (different to last entry)
- New createProfile methode : creates a wml and html profile from a 'parentAccount' (using turbine if null)
NOTE: Ensure that your parentAccount contains a wml/index.psml file!
- Reload mediatype profile if necessary (see AutoProfile.java)
- Mediatype for current profile available for velocity (mtype)
- List of used portlets available for velocity (runs)
- Name of the currently edited pane available for velocity (panename)
- Create Controller list depends on mediatype
- Create Portlet list depends on mediatype
- For wml profiles : add ClearPortletControl to each entry
- Add only Portlets if they are not already used in a pane : else we would have problems (removing)
- Save changes on wml profile immediately
- A list of already used portlets is available for velocity templates thru the runs variable
- Reload mediatype profile if necessary (see AutoProfile.java)
- Add a control to each entry in a wml psml file

- Fixed the stack error while a click on customization created a new stack entry : this is done by adding there parameter 'reset' to the url which deletes all stack objects so customization starts with the first portlet
- For the customization link I added the 'mtype' parameter : the desired mediatype profile is loaded (if not already used) by the autoprofile class (see autoprofile.java)
- If mediatype is wml we always start with the first portlet because the zero portlet is the container : I changed the wml/index.psml format (had problems with WMLCardPortlet)

author: taylor
msg: - Display icon for portlet type (pane or portlet)
- Display icon for portlet type (pane or portlet)
- Display icon for portlet type (pane or portlet)
- Display portlet dependend icon or default image (images/wml/bulleet.wbmp) (*changing*)
- Show options dependendly on the mediatype
- Display list with two different colors
- Added message if no entry is available
Used as top of wml menu!
blank.gif - empty image for layout creation
Because RSS can't be used for wml (in it's current state) I disabled it, so only working portlets are available for the customization process
Added the 'mail.support' entry this could be used as a contact email address
- Removed WMLCardController (back to old v1.3a1 psml format)

author: taylor
msg: - changed JetspeedPersistenceService to store profiles instead of deprecated documents

author: taylor
msg: fixed bug in CastorPsmlService.store to properly build path to file on file system.

author: taylor
msg: Changed update statement to not use default 'primary key' method, and instead use the secondary unique index in where clause for update criteria.
